archimate:BusinessProcess.name: (L2)(h160) Prepare ILS data in 3D environment
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Problem: configuration filtering for the DMU inducing some issues such as bad positioning, missing items or duplicates. This requires consequently a review to ensure data quality. The 3D data are prepared in a dedicated tool 3D ILS Prepa. Problem: time to generate the 3D context due to tool complexity. As example, the solution like 3DPlayer is fine enough for the activity (ILS users are not 3D tool familiar, so there is a need to have an “easy to use” solution). In terms of metrics (without considering batch process supported by Spotfire): 15mn minimum for each Engineering Change. Activity it then run in 3DPlayer In terms of metrics, the preparation represents approx. 20 % to 30% of the time, including consistency check.
